long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An ultimate AI tool for effective communications

Sup helps professionals aiming to optimize time, engage with more leads, and increase conversion rate when networking on LinkedIn and other platforms. 
By understanding the context and intent, Sup AI helper allows you to generate relevant and accurate responses to your messages. 
This makes replying to messages much quicker and easier. It also creates individualized connection requests so you don’t need to spend time writing personal messages. 
In addition, Sup generates human-like reactions to posts in your feed. Preset and custom reactions included.
With Sup, you can also prepare necessary templates, organize them by folders, and automate your networking campaigns. Sup allows you to personalize messages and pull in the recipient’s name and other essential data to show your interest.

Sales and marketing teams
Do not waste time on routine tasks and communicate with clients and partners more productively. Each new request can be generated by AI and customized for better conversion.  
HR and talents 
Cover letters, job descriptions, follow-ups – all HR-related correspondence templates and custom AI-generated responses at your fingertips; just pick one when talking to a recruiter or a candidate or let AI create one for you.

Other professionals
Organize, systemize, and automate your comms with Sup and reach your KPIs faster than ever.

Free and Premium subscriptions, suitable for any budget.
